text: Gen tte yaru ga i. `Sate, watashi wa omo ga anata gata ni taishi kinji rareta koto o, dokuju shiyou. Kare ni nanimono demo doisha o hai shite wa naranai. Ryoshin ni kokodeare. Konkyu suru no o osorete, anata gata no shijo o koroshite wa naranai. Ware wa, anata gata mo kare-ra o mo yashinau monodearu. Mata ko ke demo kakurete ite mo, minikui koto ni chikadzuite wa naranai. Mata, arra ga shinsei-ka sa reta seimei o, kenri no tame igai ni wa satsugai shite wa naranai. Ko no yo ni kare wa meiji rareta. Osoraku anata gata wa rikai surudearou
